creator: hinsonjr@yahoo.com
text:
While running 
./configure --enable-gcc

I get the error:
configure:2686 error: cannot run /bin/bash ./config.sub

When I look, there is no file config.sub (anywhere in this hierarchy).

My goal is to build the Apache plugin, but I have to admit that I am fairly new
to Apache and WEBsh. Am I doing something wrong?

I am running on Solaris 8.

This is due to an old autoconf version that we used, when we originally set up
the project. I'll look at it for the next build.
creator: ronnie.brunner@netcetera.ch
sandholm@gsinet.net
text:
Yes, I receive the same error during the configure phase.
Ran on both SuSE 8.0 & SuSE 8.2 with same error.
error: cannot run /bin/bash ./config.sub
config.sub and config.guess have been added
creator: ronnie.brunner@netcetera.ch
